sorular.soru: Which of these vehicles are emergency (priority) vehicles?
cevaplar: Vehicle of the Dept. of waterways and public works (Rijkswaterstaat) with optical and sound signals.
Ambulance with optical and sound signals.
Salvage company vehicles with yellow flashing lights.
Animal ambulance with yellow flashing lights.
dogruCevap: Vehicle of the Dept. of waterways and public works (Rijkswaterstaat) with optical and sound signals.
Ambulance with optical and sound signals.

feedback.metin: Only vehicles with (blue) optical signals and sound signals are emergency (priority) vehicles. This includes police vehicles, fire engines, ambulances, but also vehicles of the Department of waterways and public works (Rijkswaterstaat). Every vehicle that may use blue optical signals and a two toned horn is an emergency (priority) vehicle as soon as it uses these optical and sound signals. Vehicles with yellow flashing lights are not emergency (priority) vehicles. Nor are trams or vehicles of a military convoy, despite the fact that they have special rights regarding priority.

sorular.soru: Which drivers are you allowed to overtake after this sign?

feedback.metin: This sign indicates a prohibition for lorry drivers to overtake other motor vehicles. This means that this sign does not apply to you. You may overtake all vehicles, as long as it is safe to do so. Even lorries.

sorular.soru: Which drivers does this sign apply to?
cevaplar: Drivers of motorcycles with a sidecar.
dogruCevap: Drivers of motorcycles with a sidecar.

feedback.metin:
Sign C-6 indicates a closure to all motor vehicles on more than two wheels. In addition to cars, this also includes motorcycles with a sidecar, lorries, buses, but also 
brommobielen
. These last ones follow the rules of the motor vehicles, despite the fact that they are not motor vehicles.
